subject: Order #SSN1618 missing parts
description_text:
Hello,

I just opened the box for order SSN1618 and it only contains the pedals.
It is missing the VAM pro power supply and motor.
The box was in good condition and it didn't seem tampered.
See attached pictures with contents
Please help.
Best regards,
Luca Badalamenti

conversations.body_text: Hi Luca Badalamenti,  Regarding order SSN1618, we have currently only shipped the pedals. The VAM Pro motor will be shipped a few days later. Please see the details below.      Due to delays in the surface finishing of the VAM Pro housing, the first batch of orders is expected to begin shipping between June 16th and 18th. International express shipping will be used, ensuring fast delivery.
